scripts.build: cd ./client && npm i && npm run build && cd ../server && npm i && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.start: npm run client:build && npm run server
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run client:dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.client:build: cd client &&npm i &&  npm run build
scripts.server:build: cd server && npm i && npm run build
scripts.render-build: npm install && npm run build && npm run client:build
